title: The Cabinet  of Dr. Caligari
description: original music for  two percussionists by Gabriel Chwojnik

content_reasoning: 74-minute duration of the classic film with original musical accompaniment by two percussionists, full movie presentation.
film_reasoning: This is the same classic 1920 narrative film The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari with original percussion accompaniment. At 74 minutes, it's the complete feature-length expressionist horror story.
era_reasoning: Same classic 1920 German Expressionist film The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari, just with different musical accompaniment. The longer duration suggests a more complete restoration of this seminal silent horror film.
